verbs.description: [ARG0: A federal judge] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] [V: asked] [ARG1: pointed questions about special counsel Robert Mueller 's authority to bring charges against former Trump campaign chairman Paul Manafort] and suggested that prosecutors ' true motive is getting Manafort to " sing " against the president .
